tags.name: zui-logo
tags.description: `<zui-logo>` allows for easy standardized use for our Zywave logos, and supports third party logos if slotted in.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: If using a Zywave logo, specify a type value e.g. type="tagline | zycon | zycon-circle", if no type is specified it defaults to main Zywave logo

properties.name: type
properties.description: If using a Zywave logo, specify a type value e.g. type="tagline | zycon | zycon-circle", if no type is specified it defaults to main Zywave logo

slots.description: Unnamed slot, only use to slot in a third party logo, do not use if using a Zywave logo
